title: User Manual
description: This manual provides guidance on how to use TaraG and its features effectively.

sections.subtitle: 1. Getting Started
sections.description: Download the TaraG app from the official store. Sign up using your email, Google account, or guest login. Complete your profile to personalize your experience.

sections.subtitle: 2. Navigating the App
sections.description: The home screen provides quick access to your location, itineraries, routes, and weather updates. Use the bottom navigation bar to switch between main features.

sections.subtitle: 3. Creating an Itinerary
sections.description: Tap 'Itinerary' to create, edit, or delete trips. Add destinations, travel dates, and notes. You can also use the AI assistant to suggest itineraries and convert them into saved plans.

sections.subtitle: 4. Using Routes
sections.description: Select a start and end point to generate routes. Choose your transport mode (walk, drive, public transport). The app will show distance, estimated travel time, and alerts.

sections.subtitle: 5. Group Travel
sections.description: Create a travel group and invite members. Share itineraries, track member locations in real-time, and use the group chat to coordinate during trips.

sections.subtitle: 6. Weather Forecasts
sections.description: View the current weather and extended forecast for your selected city or current location. Receive alerts for weather conditions that may affect your trip.

sections.subtitle: 7. Emergency Features
sections.description: Use the emergency button to quickly send an alert to your registered emergency contact. The app also provides information about nearby hospitals, police, and fire stations.

sections.subtitle: 8. Bill Splitting
sections.description: Record expenses during your trip and split costs among group members. TaraG will automatically calculate each memberâ€™s share.

sections.subtitle: 9. Profile and Settings
sections.description: Manage your personal details, profile photo, and account preferences. Customize the app theme (light/dark mode) and adjust notification settings.

sections.subtitle: 10. Support
sections.description: If you encounter issues, visit the Support Center in the app or contact us directly at [Your Support Email or Website].
